name: Do Not Enter Game
description:
this is intended to be the start of a 3d version of my 2D house on the hill game. this game is still in early prototyping stage and only has a small part of the game started. please enjoy wandering the maze to find the house. Stay in the light of the lamps to keep away the monsters.

This game is only a prototype and will need help to fund the full development of the game so any donations will go to the development of this game and many more
